"ロックベアの腕肉と木の実の調達":
"I decided to serve the Rockbear meat as
a steak and it seemed to go over really
well. I had some left over arm meat and
used it as a soup stock. Would you
believe that was even more popular? The
secret ingredient was a fruit the
Rockbears like. Unfortunately, I'm out of
both now. Can I trouble you to get some
more?
※Cae de Nv.21+ Rockbears."
